name: Arcane
desc: Sorcery at its rawest is in the form of arcane energy, and this energy is molded and manipulated to create the effects of all other Arcane Specializations.

spells.name: Arcane Bolt
spells.desc: The sorcerer creates a light-purple bolt of arcane energy that unerringly slams into an enemy. [Arcane]

spells.name: Arcane Ward
spells.desc: An aura surrounds a target ally protecting it and granting resistance to arcane energy. Those protected take less damage from attacks that do [Arcane] damage. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.
rankdesc: Arcane Resistance: +4, Effect all group members

spells.name: Discern Magic
spells.desc: A sorcerer can attempt to unlock the mystery of an enchanted object. By studying it, the magical properties might be discerned.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.desc: A sorcerer can attempt to break an enchantment and remove the magical effect from a creature. If the target is an ally, one negative effect will be removed. If the target is an enemy, one beneficial effect will be removed. If the target has multiple magical effects affecting it, one will be chosen at random.
rankdesc: Removes Tier 3 Effect, Remove all magical effects

spells.name: Read Magic
spells.desc: Interpreting arcane writings normally requires extensive learning and they may be in the form of runes or symbols that are hard to understand. While under the effects of Read Magic, the sorcerer has an innate understanding of magical writing and can easily read its script.

spells.name: Resist Magic
spells.desc: The caster is granted resistance to all magical effects, beneficial and harmful.

spells.name: Sense Magic
spells.desc: All magic has a hidden aura about it. A sorcerer that can sense those auras can use them to determine what enchantments are affecting thier allies and enemies.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.desc: Scattered across the land are anchient magical stones built by unknown beings of ages past. Sorcerers can use the magical energies that surround them to deconstruct themselves and their allies and then reconstitute elsewhere.

legend.name: Anti-Magic Zone
legend.desc: The sorcerer creates an area within and adjacent to their rank, that hinders spell casting and the functioning of magic items of anyone within, or targeting those ranks. If the Anti-Magic Zone would lower the Tier of a spell being cast to 0 or below, the spell fizzles out. If there are ongoing spell effects or magic items then the Anti-Magic Zone may suppress the effects if their Tier is modified to 0 or below. If the Anti-Magic Zone is not strong enough to reduce the Tier to 0 or below then the magic functions normally.

legend.name: Wish
legend.desc: Make a wish, any wish at all.

name: Bardic Songs of Sorcery
desc: Bards use performance to create magic. They spin dances, melody, and stories into grand effect.

spells.name: Blazing Dragon
spells.desc: As the bard plays, a small fiery dragon appears nearby, swirling and darting about. Each turn that a bard sustains the performance, the dragon will fly through all enemies in the targeted rank.

spells.name: Captivate
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: Dance of Shadows
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: Dissonant Chords
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: Nature’s Melody
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: Song of Inspiration
spells.desc: The bard’s song is a quick paced tune that inspires those who hear it with hope and fervor. Any allies that can hear the bard and are within 30’ are filled with new found inspiration.

legend.name: spell 1
legend.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

name: Druidic
desc: Druidic descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

spells.name: Bark Armor
spells.desc: The sorcerer becomes wrapped in a thick bark armor that provides protection against attacks. The caster cannot be wearing any other type of armor.

spells.name: Call Animal Companion
spells.desc: Help is summoned from the wild. Something that would natively be found in the area. At the end of the duration it leaves

spells.name: Call Swarm
spells.desc: Upon casting, Call Swarm calls forth a swarm of bees, wasps, scarabs, scorpions, and other insects.

spells.name: Call Lightning
spells.desc: With a thunderous bang, a lightning bolt is called from the sky to strike nearby. [Electric]

spells.name: Claws of the Beast
spells.desc: You grow long razor sharp claws like a bear, counts as magical

spells.name: Moonblade
spells.desc: Creates a pale blade of energy resembling moonlight that only the sorcerer may wield. The blade is equivalent to a short sword and any Expertise or other modifiers that would affect a short sword, affect the Moonblade. [Arcane]

spells.name: Nature’s Shroud
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: Tanglevine
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

legend.name: Creeping Death
legend.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

legend.name: Shapeshift
legend.desc: spell 2 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

name: Elemental
desc: Sorcerers that delve into the Elemental Specialization have attuned themselves to all four elements and mastered them equally.

spells.name: Elemental Arrows
spells.desc: Magical arrows appear next to the sorcerer and fly toward a single enemy striking it. Each arrow created is of a random elemental type. [Acid] [Cold] [Electric] [Fire]

spells.name: Elemental Backlash
spells.desc: Whenever the sorcerer is hit with a melee attack, elemental energy lashes back at the attacker. For each attack, randomly determine the damage type of the backlash. [Acid] [Cold] [Electric] [Fire]

spells.name: Elemental Fury
spells.desc: The sorcerer opens a conduit to all four elemental planes allowing their energy to seep in. The sorcerer and any ally in the same rank, who cast a spell that deals an elemental damage type (Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire) has their spell’s effect increased. This increase in damage applies to all damage sources.

spells.name: Elemental Storm
spells.desc: A raging elemental storm of energy engulfs an area, hitting each enemy within the targeted rank. Each casting randomly determine the Damage Type. [Acid] [Cold] [Electric] [Fire]

spells.name: Elemental Ward
spells.desc: Sorcerer gains a bonus to all elemental resistances. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

spells.name: Elemental Weapon
spells.desc: Creates a blade of elemental energy that only the sorcerer may wield. The blade is equivalent to a short sword and any Expertise or other modifiers that would affect a short sword, affect the Elemental Weapon. The damage type is randomly determined when created. [Acid] [Cold] [Electric] [Fire]

legend.name: Elemental Maelstrom
legend.desc: The sorcerer takes on the form of a swirling mass of elemental energy. In this form, the caster gains immunity to the elements, cannot use any weapons, or cast any spells that are not from the Elemental Specialization.

legend.name: Ire of the Elemental Lords
legend.desc: The four Elemental Lords, Beraska, Dragar, Leviath, and Limmisa, join their power to rain down destruction

name: Elemental Air
desc: Elemental Air descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: Shock Ward
spells.desc: An aura surrounds the target and they take less damage from electricity. Those protected shine with a light crackling yellow aura. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

legend.name: Born of Wind
legend.desc: The sorcerer transforms into Air.   Immune to [Electric],  Fly

legend.desc: spell 2 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

name: Elemental Earth
desc: Elemental Earth descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

spells.name: Acid Rain
spells.desc: A rain of caustic acid seemingly pours down from nowhere. The Armor Penetration effect lasts for 2 turns and applies to all attacks made during that time.

spells.name: Acid Ward
spells.desc: An aura surrounds the target and they take less damage from acid. Those protected shine with a flickering pale green aura. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

spells.name: Golem
spells.desc: Stone, mud, rock, metal all around binds together to form a golem ally

spells.name: Petrify
spells.desc: You turn a creature to stone

spells.name: Stone Skin
spells.desc: The outer layer of the target’s skin becomes crusty and hard as rock.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: spell 7
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

spells.name: spell 8
spells.desc: spell 1 desc dfad  fd  fgvoisangf  n dfkljsd fj sdfl kdsajd sfnjn sdf jh jefj dsaf ldsad

legend.name: Born of Earth
legend.desc: Turns into rock like.   Immune to [Acid]    High +defense

legend.name: Meteor
legend.desc: Deals Physical and Fire damage

name: Elemental Fire
desc: Fire, the burning flame of destruction, relentlessly consumes all

spells.name: Circle of Flame
spells.desc: A blazing, stationary circle of fire erupts around the caster and continues to burn. Any enemy in an adjacent rank is caught within the effect and is engulfed in flame.

spells.name: Dragon’s Fire
spells.desc: The sorcerer sprays a jet of flame that scorches all in its path. The flame hits one target in each enemy rank.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.desc: The sorcerer conjures a blazing ball of fire and hurls it at a target where it detonates and explodes dealing damage to all in its rank.

spells.name: Fire Storm
spells.desc: Persistent waves of heat and flame form, enveloping, and burning all that are caught within the area.

spells.name: Flame Ward
spells.desc: An aura surrounds the target and they take less damage from fire. Those protected shine with a flickering orange aura. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

spells.name: Incinerate
spells.desc: The sorcerer causes a single target to become enveloped in an intensely burning flame. Anyone killed through incineration leaves nothing but ashen remains.

spells.name: Nova
spells.desc: The caster ignites with an intensely bright light that explodes outwardly. Any enemy caught within an adjacent rank feels the searing heat.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.desc: A wall of blazing fire rises from the ground damaging creatures caught within it.

legend.name: Born of Flame
legend.desc: The sorcerer transforms into a fiery version of oneself embodying the destructive power of flame. While in this form the sorcerer is immune to fire damage and only Elemental Fire sorceries may be cast.

legend.name: Firya’s Wrath
legend.desc: When evoking Firya’s Wrath a series of flaming arrows forming a halo burst into existence above the sorcerer’s head before launching toward their target.

name: Elemental Water
desc: Elemental Water descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

spells.name: Aqua Transit
spells.desc: lets swim

spells.name: Blizzard
spells.desc: The area surrounding the caster sees its temperature plummet to below freezing and a blinding snowstorm begins raging.

spells.name: Cold Snap
spells.desc: A gust of frigid air circles the sorcerer and frost forms on the ground. Any enemy within an adjacent rank is blasted by the freezing, cold air.

spells.name: Cold Ward
spells.desc: An aura surrounds the target and they take less damage from the cold. Those protected shine with a flickering white and blue aura. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

spells.name: Freeze
spells.desc: Creature becomes frozen as body turns into ice.

spells.name: Ice Shield
spells.desc: A hovering block of ice forms and positions itself between the sorcerer and any enemies. The shield moves with the sorcerer and will stay in a position that offers protection. After 3 successful attacks from an enemy the shield will break.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.desc: Large frozen balls and shards of ice fall from the sky battering enemies. The fragments of ice deal a mix of [Physical] Damage and [Cold] Damage.

spells.name: Water Hydra
spells.desc: Creates water columns that attack enemies.

legend.name: Born of Winter
legend.desc: The sorcerers skin freezes over and becomes cold to the touch taking on a pale white and blue color that looks like ice. An intense cold can be felt radiating from the caster.

legend.name: Leviath’s Jaw
legend.desc: Like the depths where Leviath stirs, the pressure of the water surrounding an enemy rises to crushing levels as if they were deep in the ocean’s abyss where nothing else can survive. Leviath’s Jaw is only usable on a target that is fully submerged.

name: Enchantment
desc: Enchantment descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

name: Healing
desc: Healing descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

spells.name: Cure Disease
spells.desc: Removes a disease from an afflicted target.

spells.name: Cure Poison
spells.desc: Removes a Poison from the body of a target curing them of any adverse effects.

spells.name: Death’s Anchor
spells.desc: Prevents an ally from dropping below 0 HP. If a target is already below 0 HP they do not take any more damage and death is delayed until the spell ends.

spells.name: Death Ward
spells.desc: An aura surrounds the target and they take less damage from the draining effects of death. Those protected shine with a lightly glowing white aura. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

spells.name: Healing
spells.desc: Heals a target of its wounds.

spells.name: Healing Burst
spells.desc: Heals allies within same rank.

spells.name: Lift Curse
spells.desc: Removes a curse affecting a target

spells.name: Renewal
spells.desc: Heals a target each turn over a short period of time.

legend.name: Restoration
legend.desc: A powerful healing spell that restores an individual

legend.name: Resurrection
legend.desc: Brings a target ally back to life

name: Illusion
desc: Illusion descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

name: Necromancy
desc: Necromancy descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

spells.name: Enervate
spells.desc: Necromantic magic steals away a creatures life essence leaving it weakened and sickly. Their skin appears to age and shrivel as their body fails them.

spells.name: Enfeeble
spells.desc: Exposure to the Frostwind saps a creature’s strength leaving it feeble and weak.

spells.name: Frostwind Aura
spells.desc: The sorcerer creates a small tear in the veil causing the Frostwind to spill into the area affecting all creatures within the targeted rank. [Death]

spells.name: Gather Spirits
spells.desc: Summon lesser spirits

spells.name: Life Leech
spells.desc: Steals life from living victims and restores yours.

spells.name: Raise Dead
spells.desc: Create animated lesser undead

spells.name: Spirit Shield
spells.desc: The sorcerer is swapped in a pale shroud that protect vs Incorporeal attacks only.

spells.name: The Pale Grasp
spells.desc: The sorcerer’s hand takes on a pale and almost skeletal appearance as it reaches out to channel the Frostwind into a victim. [Death]

legend.name: Death’s Embrace
legend.desc: While under this curse HP healing is less effective
rankdesc: Healing spells are only three-quarters effective
Healing spells are only half effective

legend.name: Lichdom
legend.desc: You become a lich

name: Protection
desc: Protection descdsfa s d fasdf dsafsad fd asfdafsad fa sdfa sdf asdfs da f ds f df da asdf afsad dsaf sad fadsfads fads f df

spells.name: Magic Armor
spells.desc: The sorcerer creates a protective, translucent armor providing protection against attacks and arcane damage.

spells.name: Protection Against Elements Ward
spells.desc: An aura surrounds the target and they take less damage from a chosen element: Acid, Cold, Fire, or Electric. Those protected shine with an aura similar to the full ward. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

spells.name: Resist Disease
spells.desc: To ward off the effects of Disease

spells.name: Resist Poison
spells.desc: To combat the effects of Poison.

spells.name: Shared Life
spells.desc: Sorcerer takes half the damage a targeted ally would take

legend.name: Immunity Ward
legend.desc: An aura surrounds the target granting immunity to a specified damage type Acid, Arcane, Cold, Death, Electric, Fire. Only one type of ward may be active at a time.

spells.name: Black Arrows
spells.desc: Create black, whispy arrows that slam into targets

spells.name: Black Tendrils
spells.desc: Wisps of black tendrils spring from the ground, constricting and ensnaring a target.

spells.name: Cloaked in Shadow
spells.desc: You envelop yourself in Shadow making it hard for others to distinguish you from the surroundings.

legend.name: Shadow Form
legend.desc: In Shadowform take on the appearance of deep black shadow with wispy purple eyes.
